name: Mine Or Die
storyline: The story of Mine or Die is based very far in the future. The world is completely torn due to war and abuse. Above the surface the worlds resources are depleted. The only resources left are beneath the surface. Naturally the only real job is mining. As the player you are no exception. Your job like most others is mining. One day, while doing your daily work, you are kidnapped. Your kidnapper, a mysterious fat, greedy jerk. He throws you into a cave any forces you to mine treasures for him, if you are to escape with you life.
summary:
Mine or Die is a 2D platform video-game in pixel art style, inspired by the challenging 8-Bit classics, with unique game play. It is currently in development for Android we do plan to release on IOS and Steam as well. 
 
  In Mine or Die as the player, you will be faced with many challenges. The main goal is to find all of the treasures in any given level. Once you have found them all, all you have to do is find the exit and escape. Sounds easy right? Think again, your life is on the line against time, enemies, obstacles , and challenging puzzles, but there's more. The world is unstable and regenerating, everything you mine and destroy will return to its natural state. To reach the deep treasures you will have to be fast or die! Using your abilities to mine, shrink and avoid bad things you will have to learn each individual level to escape with the treasures as well as with-in the time limit.
